about.summary: Simple integration of Flask and WTForms

name: flask-wtf
raw_recipe:
{%set name = "flask-wtf" %}
{%set camelName = "Flask-WTF" %}
{%set version = "0.12" %}
{%set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{%set hash_val = "bd99316c97ed1d1cb90b8f0c242c86420a891a6a2058f20717e424bf5b0bb80e" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ camelName }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash_val }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - flask
    - werkzeug
    - wtforms

test:
  imports:
    - flask_wtf
    - flask_wtf.recaptcha

about:
  home: http://github.com/lepture/flask-wtf
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  summary: 'Simple integration of Flask and WTForms'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pmlandwehr
